traits.name: Size
traits.description: Genasi are as varied as their mortal parents but are generally built like humans, standing anywhere from 5 feet to over 6 feet tall. Your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Constitution score increases by 2 and your Dexterity score increases by 1.

traits.name: Unending Breath
traits.description: You can hold your breath indefinitely while youâ€™re not incapacitated.

traits.name: Mingle with the Wind
traits.description: You can cast the levitate spell once with this trait, requiring no material components, and you regain the ability to cast it this way when you finish a long rest. Constitution is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Constitution score increases by 2 and your Strength score increases by 1.

traits.name: Earth Walk
traits.description: You can move across difficult terrain made of earth or stone without expending extra movement.

traits.name: Merge with Stone
traits.description: You can cast the pass without trace spell once with this trait, requiring no material components, and you regain the ability to cast it this way when you finish a long rest. Constitution is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Constitution score increases by 2 and your Intelligence score increases by 1.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. Your ties to the Elemental Plane of Fire make your darkvision unusual: everything you see in darkness is in a shade of red.

traits.name: Fire Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to fire damage.

traits.name: Reach to the Blaze
traits.description: You know the produce flame cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast the burning hands spell once with this trait as a 1st-level spell, and you regain the ability to cast it this way when you finish a long rest. Constitution is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Constitution score increases by 2 and your Wisdom score increases by 1.

traits.name: Acid Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to acid damage.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: You can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Swim
traits.description: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet

traits.name: Call to the Wave
traits.description: You know the shape water cantrip (see chapter 2). When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the create or destroy water spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait, and you regain the ability to cast it this way when you finish a long rest. Constitution is your spellcasting ability for these spells.
